messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] snow in North Dakota
messages.msgSnippet: I m in the Finger Lakes region too.  We live in Farmington (near Canandaigua).  It was windy and cold here today.  We had a busy day:chess, drama,4-h, baking
messages.messageBody:
I'm in the Finger Lakes region too. We live in Farmington (near
Canandaigua). It was windy and cold here today. We had a busy day:chess,
drama,4-h, baking banana bread.
ary-NY

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] snow in North Dakota
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, that s right, Finger Lakes region.  right between Seneca and Cayuga Lakes.  It has turned really cold today, since yesterday.  a 30 degree drop and oh the
messages.messageBody:
Yes, that's right, Finger Lakes region. right between Seneca and Cayuga
Lakes. It has turned really cold today, since yesterday. a 30 degree
drop and oh the wind!
A good day to stay in and bake muffins. We usually have Friday off from
school which kind of leaves the day open. Yay! you and your family have
a great day, OK?
Dawn C

messages.msgSnippet: Hi, other neighbor!  Finger Lakes Region?  Is that right?  It is WINDY out there and getting colder by the hour! Dawn
messages.messageBody:
Hi, other neighbor! Finger Lakes Region? Is that right? It is WINDY out
there and getting colder by the hour!

Dawn

We're new here, so I just wanted to say "hi" from Waterloo NY where the
wind is blowing and the temps are lowering!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] snow in North Dakota
messages.msgSnippet: It s over 70 degrees in Cleveland!

messages.subject: snow in North Dakota
messages.msgSnippet: I forwarded the snow-note to a friend of mine in Grand Forks and asked if they were getting snow too, and he wrote this: 6 inches and still coming down today.
messages.messageBody:
I forwarded the snow-note to a friend of mine in Grand Forks and asked if
they were getting snow too, and he wrote this:


6 inches and still coming down today. i may be snowed in at work. we're

closing at 1 pm today. there'sa blizzard watch right now in effect. that's

bad, even in north dakota.


hope the power stays on at my house.


paul

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] snow in North Dakota
messages.msgSnippet: In  WNY too, but it is supposed to get cold before nightfall and snow tomorrow, and since we are only three hours from you, I doubt your weather is scheduled
messages.messageBody:
In WNY too, but it is supposed to get cold before nightfall and snow
tomorrow, and since we are only three hours from you, I doubt your weather is
scheduled to stay warm much longer. Sorry for the reality check!

Dawn

Unschoolingmommy@... wrote:

> It's over 70 degrees in Cleveland!
